name: Yen Tran
about: Business-minded and passionate in people development, leveraging people’s potentials to create business values.

experiences.description:
• Work with business leaders on people plan in all the organizational transformation efforts of the functions supported, ensuring smooth transition and lasting organizational effectiveness as envisioned by the change project 
• Ensure that best talents are attracted, retained, developed, and succeeded across the functions 
• Identify, develop current and future-ready capability requirements within assigned functions 
• Promote & facilitate agile culture in squad team projects 
• Drives sustainable and proactive Industrial/Employee Relations programs that ensures industrial peace and harmony with the labor unions across the organization. 
• Counsel Business Leaders on the HR aspects of key business strategies, issues and decisions
• Work with business leaders on people plan in all the organizational transformation efforts of the functions supported, ensuring smooth transition and lasting organizational effectiveness as envisioned by the change project • Ensure that best talents are attracted, retained, developed, and succeeded across the functions • Identify, develop current and future-ready capability requirements within assigned functions • Promote & facilitate agile culture in squad team projects • Drives sustainable and proactive Industrial/Employee Relations programs that ensures industrial peace and harmony with the labor unions across the organization. • Counsel Business Leaders on the HR aspects of key business strategies, issues and decisions
experiences.position_title: HRBP Manager - Manufacturing cum Industrial Relation

experiences.description:
Involve in end to end greenfield project factory- from start up, ramp up & mass production phrases
Manage a team of 3 HR generalist

Responsible for front line strategic human resources support ensuring Human Resources functions and activities run effectively, efficiently, and in accordance with First Solar’s Core Values. 
• Lead on time in full of Human Resource Planning (HRP) by working Business Leaders and in alignment to Global HR strategy
• Lead Employer branding activities such as synthesize target candidate insights to ensure communication & activation ideas to attract target candidates and build up partnership with target Universities/colleges
• Develop, deploy a local learning strategy that is in line with the 70/20 strategy that covers Business Skills, Professional Skills and Leadership Skills programs 
• Ensure global HR policy in alignment to Vietnam Labor Law and counsel Business Leaders on the HR aspects of industrial relation/employee relation, issues and decisions
• Lead and support more complex HR initiatives and analysis and special projects as assigned and act as a mentor to HR Generalists to ensure a “best in class”, customer focused HR Organization.

Partner with Operations to develop recruitment ramp up plan to fulfill manpower needs. Establish employer brand on market through talent attraction activities & building up long term relationship with universities. Corporate with Operations to build up the competency matrix, conduct training analysis & development requirements

Partner with business leaders to ensure staffing requirements are met to identify, attract and onboard top talent to efficiently and effectively meet changing business needs. Participate in developing recruiting strategy and provide full cycle recruiting for the organization.
